reference: Gale, Ian, "Sequential Trading in a Competitive Asset Market with Informed Traders," unpublished, University of Wisconsin, 1987.

Kreps, David and Robert Wilson, "Sequential Equilibria," Econometrica, 50 (July 1982), 863-894.
Kyle, Albert S., "Continuous Auctions and Insider Trading," Econometrica, 53 (November 1985), 1315-1335.
Leiand, Hayne E. and David Pyle, "Informational Asymmetries, Financial Structure and Financial Intermediation," Journal of Finance, Vol. XXXII (May 1977), 371-387.
Stiglitz, Joseph E., "Information and Capital Markets," In Financial Markets: Essays In Honor of Paul Cootner, Prentice-Hall, Inc., 1982.
Welch, Ivo, "Seasoned Offerings, Imitation Costs, and the Underpricing of Initial Public Offerings," Journal of Finance (forthcoming, June 1989).
